item.description:
This isn't your typical free concert! Boston originals Sarah Borges and John Cate Band are going to rock the common at Natick Village Green on Friday. This a cross-group event. Come join other members of these fun groups:

Beantown and Beyond 20-40 Something Singles
The Metro West 30's to 40's Singles Meetup Group
Boston Live Music


SAMPLE THE SOUND:
Sarah Borges Music
John Cate Music

IMPORTANT STUFF:
Start Time: We meet around 6:15 by the flagpole to grab a spot and socialize. Music starts at 7:30.
Sitting Together: This is a public event, so we might not all be together.
Directions: Directions To Natick Common
Parking: Parking behind Natick Federal Saving Bank across the street, library down the street, and on street meters (I think are free after 5:30... but better check, I don't reimburse parking tickets!)
Rain location: At the TCAN Center (walking distance from the common) Directions to TCAN

PRESS: Read what what the critics have to say!
Sarah Borges Press
John Cate New & Reviews

PROMO:
ROCK IN THE COMMON: Sarah Borges and the Broken Singles with the John Cate Band

TCAN is pleased to host our third annual outdoor concert in Natick Common, featuring two of Boston’s best original bands. Whether it’s called Americana or Roots music, the stonewashed sound of artists like Tom Petty, John Mellencamp, Eagles, Bruce Springsteen and new faces like Sarah Borges and John Cate are fresh yet familiar, and completely comfortable. Bring a blanket and join us under the stars! Rain location at TCAN. Directions to TCAN

Visit Sarah Borges and John Cate John Cate
item.how_to_find_us: See my posted pic. More details to follow.
item.name: Rock The Common - Free Concert
